Question: This person cites these misattributions as "his only real beef with peer-to-peer file sharing sites":.
Hints: This person was picked to perform by the Canadian band Godspeed You! Black Emperor, who curated the festival's lineup.
They used to have a pet poodle, named Bela (pictured atop this person's head on the cover of his album, Poodle Hat).
This person married Suzanne Krajewski in 2001; their daughter, Nina, was born in 2003.
